issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

While in the process of testing to see if Eucalyptus CloudWatch behaves the same way as [AWS CloudWatch with regards to instance monitoring being enabled|http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/using-cloudwatch.html], the following was noticed:
# When instances were launched without monitoring enabled, metrics did not show up at all.  On AWS, by default, there is basic monitoring - which is provided in 5 minute periods after an instance is launched.
# On a running instance, metrics for the instance were not available until almost 15 minutes later.
{code}
[root@d-01 ~]# euca-monitor-instances i-5b089c81 --region devops-admin@shared-setup-1; date
i-5b089c81	monitoring-enabled
Thu Jan 14 06:40:09 PST 2016
[root@d-01 ~]# date; euwatch-list-metrics --region devops-admin@shared-setup-1
Thu Jan 14 06:41:14 PST 2016
[root@d-01 ~]# date; euwatch-list-metrics --region devops-admin@shared-setup-1
Thu Jan 14 06:42:22 PST 2016
[root@d-01 ~]# date; euwatch-list-metrics --region devops-admin@shared-setup-1
Thu Jan 14 06:43:28 PST 2016
[root@d-01 ~]# date; euwatch-list-metrics --region devops-admin@shared-setup-1
Thu Jan 14 06:44:35 PST 2016
[root@d-01 ~]# date; euwatch-list-metrics --region devops-admin@shared-setup-1
Thu Jan 14 06:45:46 PST 2016
[root@d-01 ~]# date; euwatch-list-metrics --region devops-admin@shared-setup-1
Thu Jan 14 06:46:52 PST 2016
[root@d-01 ~]# date; euwatch-list-metrics --region devops-admin@shared-setup-1
Thu Jan 14 06:49:37 PST 2016
.....
[root@d-01 ~]# date; euwatch-list-metrics --region devops-admin@shared-setup-1
Thu Jan 14 06:55:32 PST 2016
CPUUtilization	AWS/EC2
CPUUtilization	AWS/EC2	{ImageId=emi-ea5885b7}
CPUUtilization	AWS/EC2	{InstanceId=i-5b089c81}
CPUUtilization	AWS/EC2	{InstanceType=m1.small}
DiskReadBytes	AWS/EC2
DiskReadBytes	AWS/EC2	{ImageId=emi-ea5885b7}
DiskReadBytes	AWS/EC2	{InstanceId=i-5b089c81}
DiskReadBytes	AWS/EC2	{InstanceType=m1.small}
DiskReadOps	AWS/EC2
DiskReadOps	AWS/EC2	{ImageId=emi-ea5885b7}
DiskReadOps	AWS/EC2	{InstanceId=i-5b089c81}
DiskReadOps	AWS/EC2	{InstanceType=m1.small}
DiskWriteBytes	AWS/EC2
....
{code}

*Signs*

On the [Shared Setup 1 cloud|https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/QA/QA+Shared+Setups#QASharedSetups-FederatedSetup], there were around 31 instances running.  This *may* have contributed to the delay in Cloudwatch metrics being reported, but not sure.
{code}
[root@d-01 ~]# euserv-describe-node-controllers --region euca-admin@localhost | grep INST | wc -l
31
[root@d-01 ~]# euserv-describe-node-controllers --region euca-admin@localhost
NODE  one  10.111.1.209  enabled
INSTANCE  i-2c738757
INSTANCE  i-d82bcc80
INSTANCE  i-a96fa1a7
INSTANCE  i-b0f7a387
INSTANCE  i-a55aa8e9
INSTANCE  i-51451157
INSTANCE  i-32d590f5
INSTANCE  i-c5985416
INSTANCE  i-473bbeca
NODE  two  10.111.5.119  enabled
INSTANCE  i-e89f14b1
INSTANCE  i-8c200ee5
INSTANCE  i-d30f11a7
INSTANCE  i-5b089c81
INSTANCE  i-0109dcff
INSTANCE  i-a97bc2c5
INSTANCE  i-22cebd56
INSTANCE  i-378437c4
NODE  one  10.111.5.125  enabled
INSTANCE  i-e09e4153
INSTANCE  i-4dfded93
INSTANCE  i-4c6d1761
INSTANCE  i-a0b63bff
NODE  two  10.111.5.189  enabled
INSTANCE  i-8d359fda
INSTANCE  i-2320dfe5
INSTANCE  i-d4c4d6df
INSTANCE  i-34a6dd49
INSTANCE  i-aaa613f5
INSTANCE  i-deb560eb
INSTANCE  i-66f00853
INSTANCE  i-23f53b56
INSTANCE  i-ddec6486
INSTANCE  i-f83f31dd
[root@d-01 ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones verbose --region euca-admin@localhost
AVAILABILITYZONE	one	10.111.1.206 arn:euca:eucalyptus:one:cluster:one-cc-1/
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- vm types	free / max   cpu   ram  disk
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.small	0006 / 0022   1    256     5
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- t1.micro	0006 / 0022   1    256     5
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.medium	0003 / 0010   1    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.medium	0003 / 0010   2    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.large	0003 / 0010   2    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.xlarge	0003 / 0010   2   1024    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.xlarge	0002 / 0006   2   2048    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.xlarge	0002 / 0006   2   2048    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.xlarge	0002 / 0006   4   2048    15
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.2xlarge	0001 / 0002   2   4096    30
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.2xlarge	0001 / 0002   4   4096    30
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   3072    60
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   4096    60
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hi1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   6144   120
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc2.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   6144   120
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cg1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   12288   200
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cr1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   16384   240
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hs1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  48   119808  24000
AVAILABILITYZONE	two	10.111.5.116 arn:euca:eucalyptus:two:cluster:two-cc-1/
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- vm types	free / max   cpu   ram  disk
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.small	0007 / 0022   1    256     5
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- t1.micro	0007 / 0022   1    256     5
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.medium	0003 / 0010   1    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.medium	0003 / 0010   2    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.large	0003 / 0010   2    512    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m1.xlarge	0003 / 0010   2   1024    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- c1.xlarge	0003 / 0006   2   2048    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.xlarge	0003 / 0006   2   2048    10
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.xlarge	0002 / 0006   4   2048    15
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.2xlarge	0001 / 0002   2   4096    30
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m3.2xlarge	0001 / 0002   4   4096    30
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   3072    60
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- m2.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   4096    60
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hi1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000   8   6144   120
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cc2.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   6144   120
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cg1.4xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   12288   200
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- cr1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  16   16384   240
AVAILABILITYZONE	|- hs1.8xlarge	0000 / 0000  48   119808  24000
{code}

*Steps*

# Launched two instances on Shared Setup 1 region
# After 5 minutes, observed Cloudwatch metrics were not being displayed.
# Enabled monitoring on one of the running instances
# After 1 minute, observed Cloudwatch metrics were not displayed.
# Kept checking every minute to confirm when the Cloudwatch metrics would finally show up.
fields.summary: Eucalyptus CloudWatch Behavior Regarding Instance Monitoring Different Than AWS CloudWatch

comments.body: There are CW improvements planned for 4.3. We may not get to these specific problems, but for now targeting to 4.3.
